response: Introducing the 2023 Harley Davidson Trike lineup, featuring the Road Glide Three and the Freewheeler. The Road Glide Three combines the hot rod attitude of the Freewheeler with the comfort of the Road Glide, offering optimized handling, performance, and a limited factory warranty. Key features include cast aluminum wheels, a Milwaukee 81 14 powertrain, and rider safety enhancements. Available in vivid black, gray haze, and bright billiard blue. The Freewheeler gets a blacked-out restyle, aligning with the touring Special models, and is available in vivid black, white sand pearl, and bright billiard blue with billiard gray. These trikes embody Harley Davidson's engineering excellence, offering safety, performance, comfort, and durability.
title: MY23 Motorcycle Launch-Trikes_v9 (1).mp4
